Articles.Content:
bawk!

So, I searched but did not see anything on the forums about this; has anyone considered launching a community teamspeak or ventrillo server? We seem to have a large, dedicated and active community; I am sure many of us would enjoy talking little green men and explosions with fellow players.

Sadly I can not host one. More or less wondering if this interests people and if so, if anyone wants to host it? :-D

-FPC

This would be pretty fun actually.

I back it!

I have no idea how to host teamspeak/vent so I probably couldn\'t do it xD

The horror of a dozen 12yo kids screaming in your ear.

Arrr!

The horror of a dozen 12yo kids screaming in your ear.

This was my thought exactly...

...and being a sadist, I\'m going to set up a TS3 server. Back in a bit!

The horror of a dozen 12yo kids screaming in your ear.

And that is probably still what it will be like, joking aside.

Let\'s put it to the test!

TeamSpeak 3 Server Address: ksp.nabaal.net

(If that doesn\'t work, your DNS hasn\'t updated yet. Use 173.193.193.214:9995 instead.)

100-man cap for now, can expand if necessary.
Apropos that a tester establishes this. I look forward to hearing how this turns out!
Works fine. Hopefully it will catch on and people will actually come on and talk shop :-D haha

Let\'s put it to the test!

TeamSpeak 3 Server Address: ksp.nabaal.net

(If that doesn\'t work, your DNS hasn\'t updated yet. Use 173.193.193.214:9995 instead.)

100-man cap for now, can expand if necessary.

How do you join this

/Imsuchanoob

[list type=decimal]

[li]Download and install TeamSpeak 3. Download the client for your operating system from here: http://www.teamspeak.com/?page=downloads[/li]

[li]Launch TeamSpeak 3. In the Connections menu, click Connect.[/li]

[li]In the Server Address box, type: ksp.nabaal.net[/li]

[li]In the Nickname box, pick a name. I suggest using your forum username.[/li]

[li]No password is required. Click Connect.[/li]

You can also set up a bookmark to easily reconnect. Just connect to the server, click the Bookmarks menu, and then click Add To Bookmarks.

This is brilliant, more should know about this!

Logged in, all is go. Will be in here for awhile if you want to join me. <3
with the right moderation something like this could work, best asking the guys in irc for some advice on the subject
Maybe make an official thread? Get more users to test it out?
Hey I joined and it seems pretty cool. Quick question though. Why are some of the channels password-protects / how do I get those passwords?
This still works? The thread is pretty old heh. Best ask majiir over on IRC in the #kspmodders channel (where he usually hangs out)
